articles.title: Reserve Bank of India puts on hold NUE licensing - The Economic Times
articles.description: The regulator will not grant permission to any of the six consortiums to commence business as all of them have fallen short of the RBI's expectations, said people familiar with the matter.
articles.content: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) is said to have put on hold licensing of the New Umbrella Entity (NUE) network, a fintech institution planned as a rival to National Payments Corporation of India (NPC… [+3291 chars]

articles.title: Wall St rallies as jobs, services data calm rate hike worries - Reuters.com
articles.description: Wall Street's main indexes all gained more than 2% on Friday after December payrolls expanded more than expected even as wage increases slowed and services activity contracted, easing worries about the Federal Reserve's interest rate hiking path.
